reason: UNDEFINED NOTATION: The cycle notation (1 6 4 3) is used without formal definition. What does this notation mean? Is it left-to-right composition (1->6->4->3->1) or right-to-left? Different textbooks use different conventions. The proof system has NO definitions in scope (af defs returns empty). Without an explicit definition establishing the semantics of cycle notation, the claim h_1(1) = 6 is unjustified.
